swen221.lab2.model

接口 BoardView

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Board

    public interface BoardView
    Implements a view of the board, from which it is impossible to actually change the board. This view can be passed to rules so they can "see" the board, but not change it.
    作者:
    David J. Pearce

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int getCellState(int x, int y)
      Get the state of a given cell on the board
      int getHeight()
      Get the height of the board (in cells)
      int getWidth()
      Get the width of the board (in cells)

    • 方法详细资料

        Get the height of the board (in cells)

      • getCellState

        int getCellState(int x,
                 int y)
        Get the state of a given cell on the board
        参数:
        x - Horizontal position of Cell
        y - Vertical position of Cell
        返回:
